amendment.description: Page 29, line 7, strike ", or that" and insert "or gross negligence, or that".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House report 114-790 to include gross negligence as an additional reason for obtaining funding following an emergency at a water resources development project.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Lawrence amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mrs. Lawrence.
